caption.p: ( A) The structure of the picornavirus (30 nm). The viral structural proteins (VP1–VP4) are depicted. ( B) Schematic representation of the EV-A71 genome (7.4 Kb). The Open Reading Frame (ORF) contains the structural viral protein P1 which is cleaved to yield VP1, VP2, VP3 and VP4 and non-structural viral proteins P2 (cleaved to yield 2A, 2B and 2C) and P3 (cleaved to yield 3A, 3B, 3C and 3D). The 3′-NTR end of the genome contains the poly ( A) tail.
